creator: chdh@inventec.ch
text:
Documentation error on page http://ant.apache.org/manual/properties.html :
Quote: "The <target> element and various tasks (such as <exit>) ..."

There is no <exit> task. Should probably be <fail>.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
Thanks.

At one point in time <fail> was called <exit>.

fixed in svn but won't appear online before the next release - unless we switch to a different method for our website.
